about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Fearscape: The Boogeyman is a first-person psychological horror game. Step into a slow-paced, atmospheric world and explore a mysterious, ever-changing house that is both eerily calming and deeply unsettling. Prepare for a truly spine-chilling experience.

STORYLINE

Ryan thought he was safe, alone in a quiet house. But after a call from his mother saying she won’t return until the next day, he begins to sense he’s not alone. Something dark and terrifying has entered his home.Take on the role of Ryan as you explore a house haunted by unseen horrors. Every choice you make could mean survival. The Boogeyman is out there, and there’s no escape.

GAMEPLAY

In this game, you are completely defenseless; no weapon can protect you from the horrifying entities lurking in every corner, behind every door, or beneath your feet. Interact with key elements, search your surroundings, and uncover things that might either help you escape this nightmare or pull you deeper into it.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION

This game contains realistic depictions of violence that may be highly disturbing. Some content may not be suitable for all ages. Player discretion is advised.

name: Fearscape: The Boogeyman
short_description: When darkness falls, the house is no longer a safe place. As Ryan, struggle to survive in a home where terror lurks in every corner. Fearscape: The Boogeyman offers a chilling horror experience, where whispers from the shadows and nightmares unfolding before your eyes await you.
